articles.title: Phil Mickelson, Bryson DeChambeau among 11 golfers to file antitrust lawsuit against PGA Tour
articles.description: Eleven golfers, including Phil Mickelson and Bryson DeChambeau, have filed an antitrust lawsuit against the PGA Tour, while three of them also filed suit to gain entry into the FedEx Cup Playoffs.
articles.content:
Phil Mickelson, Bryson DeChambeau and nine other golfers who were suspended by the PGA Tour for joining LIV Golf filed an antitrust lawsuit against the PGA Tour on Wednesday.
